Initialized(uint8).details: Triggered when the contract has been initialized or reinitialized.

Paused(address).details: Emitted when the pause is triggered by `account`.

Unpaused(address).details: Emitted when the pause is lifted by `account`.

deposit(address,uint256).details: Deposits trader collateral for margin deal

increaseLockedBalance(address,address,ui.details: Traders lock their collateral for the limit order.

pause().details: Triggers stopped state. This function can only be called by an address with the EMERGENCY_ADMIN role. Requirements: - The contract must not be paused.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

params.asset: The asset address for which available balance will be increased
params.receiver: The address of an asset receiver

unlockAsset((address,address,address,uin.details: Unlocks trader's collateral when open position by order or update deposit.

unpause().details: Returns to normal state. This function can only be called by an address with the SMALL_TIMELOCK_ADMIN or MEDIUM_TIMELOCK_ADMIN role depending on the contract. Requirements: - The contract must be paused.

useTraderAssets((address,address,address.details: Locks deposited trader's assets as collateral for orders. Decreases the available balance when opening position. Transfers deposited amount to the deposit receiver.

withdraw(address,uint256).details: Withdraws the rest of trader's deposit after closing deal

params.fromLocked: True if withdraw from locked balance

batchTopUpAvailableBalance((address[],ui.notice: The function to increase available balance for several traders

topUpAvailableBalance(address,address,ui.notice: Increases available balance of a receiver in the protocol

withdrawFrom(address,address,address,uin.notice: Withdraws an asset amount from an asset holder to a receiver
